```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(htmltools)
thumbnail <- function(title, img, href, caption = TRUE) {
  div(class = "col-sm-4",
      a(class = "thumbnail", title = title, href = href,
        img(src = img),
        div(class = if (caption) "caption",
            if (caption) title)
      )
  )
}
```

# Visulization Gallery

The gallery contains samples of visualization generated for different types of data analysis. You will need to click the blue button to see all the slides.  Here are the list for each section with a link to take you directly to selected data driven graphics: [Exploratory Data Analysis](#eda), [geographic maps](#maps), [dashboards](#dash), statistic [statstical models](#model), [sports stat summary](#sport), [COVID19 related](#covid19), [tables](#tables) and [data generated from art](#art).
